mapper.insert: insert into boards (id, title, content, createdAt, category, user_id) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{category}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.createdAt, m.email from boards b, members m where b.user_id = m.id order by b.id
select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.like, b.createdAt, b.category, m.email from boards b, members m where b.user_id = m.id and b.id = #{id}
